title: Seongdeok Oh
text:
Welcome

Seongdeok Oh
I am a doctoral student and Instructor in Public Affairs at UT Dallas.
Research Interests:

Public Management, Organizational Behavior and Theory in the Public Sector.
Performance Management in the Public Sector, Performance Information Use.
Collaborative Public Management, Co-production, Citizen Participation.
Science and Technology Policy Process, Policy Implementation and Evaluation.




Contact me
Seongdeok.Oh@utdallas.edu
Linkedin
Google Scholar

title: Seongdeok Oh

[9] (Mar.-Nov.2021) “Designing Collaborative Governance for Digital Transformation,” sponsored by Korea Information Society Development Institute, Republic of Korea, Researcher, tasks included literature review & case studies (with Prof. Hyun Joon Kim, Ukjun Sung, Junmo An, Seokjin Eom and Yeongjun Choi, Ph.D. Sijeoung Kim, & Ph.D. candidate Sun Hee Kim)
[8] (July.2020-July.2021) “The Design of Detailed Action Plans for the NST’s Unified Audit System for its Research Institutes,” sponsored by National Research Council of Science & Technology, Republic of Korea, Researcher, tasks included literature review & case studies, survey data collection and quantitative analysis (with Prof. Kwang-ho Sim, Ph.D. Cheouljoo Lee, & Lawyer. Seonghoon Choi)
[7] (April-Sep.2020) “The Improvement of the Effectiveness of the Educational Administration Audit,” sponsored by Ministry of Education, Republic of Korea, Researcher, tasks included literature review, data collection, sorting & cleaning, content analysis (with Prof. Kwang-ho Sim, & Ph.D. Cheouljoo Lee)
[6] (July.2019-July.2020), “The ‘Decoupling’ Experienced by Employees of Public Research Institute in the Use of Performance Information,” sponsored by Korea University Graduate School, Republic of Korea, Researcher, tasks included literature review, interviews, grounded theory approach & analysis, draft & final report.
[5] (Jan.-June.2019) “The Organizational Diagnosis of the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy: Changing the Policy Environment and Seeking the Ideal Direction,” sponsored by Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy, Republic of Korea, Research assistant, tasks included organization analysis & foreign countries case studies, supporting interview, drafting of final report (with Prof. Sangook Park, Jiung Yoon, & Illhwan Jung, Ph.D. Bomi Kim & Myeongrok Do)
[4] (Nov.-Dec.2018) “A Survey on University R&D Management and Its Policy Implications,” sponsored by Ministry of Science and ICT, Republic of Korea, Research assistant, tasks included literature review, data collection & survey quantitative analysis, drafting final report (with Prof. Sangook Park, & Jongbok Park, Ph.D student Gyeongjun Oh, Sangun Yoo, Wontae Ko, & M.A student Geonhui Kim)
[3] (Sep.-Oct.2018) “The Practical Method of Regulatory Consultation for Improving Policy Effectiveness,” sponsored by Korea Institute of Public Administration, Republic of Korea, Research assistant, tasks included literature review & foreign countries case studies (with Ph.D. Minho Lee, Shin Kim, & Jaeho Eun, Prof. Jinsik Choi, RA. Myongjin Kim, Yujin Choi)
[2] (May-Dec.2016) “The Development of Audit in Education and Arts,” sponsored by National Council of Governors of Education, Republic of Korea, Research assistant, tasks included case studies, supporting data collection & cleaning, survey quantitative & content analysis (with Prof. Kwang-ho Sim, & Ph.D. Cheouljoo Lee)
[1] (Jan.2015-Mar.2016) “The Evaluation of the Government-Funded Research Institutes Under Ministry of Science and ICT,” sponsored by Ministry of Science and ICT, Republic of Korea, Researcher, tasks included assisting performance measurement & evaluation, editing and drafting final reports (with Ph.D. Juho Kim, jihyeon Seo, & Seungtae Kim, Researcher Taeyun Kim, Namhyo Kim, & Suhyeon Chung)
